scripts.install:backend: echo  "âš™ï¸ Installing Backend..." && cd backend && yarn install
scripts.install:frontend: echo "âš™ï¸ Installing Frontend..." && cd frontend && yarn install
scripts.build:frontend: echo "ğŸš§ Building Frontend..." && cd frontend && yarn build
scripts.build:backend: echo "ğŸš§ Building Backend..." && cd backend && yarn build
scripts.develop: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run server" "npm run start --prefix frontend"
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run server" "npm run start --prefix frontend"
